name: burgerline
description:
Layer the burgers, and fast!

You need at least three stars to pass each level

The ingredients move to the bassline

Press SPACE to add an item

Press Q to quit

Press R to restart a level

Made with HaxeFlixel, Aseprite and Ableton Live 10.

Made for the May 2021 Action Button Goblin Bunker Game Jam
